title: Day of Wonders
verses: Day of judgment, day of wonders! Hark! the trumpet's awful sound, Louder than a
thousand thunders, shakes the vast creation round!
How the summons will the sinner's heart confound!

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Describes the awesome power and terror of the Day of Judgment with its trumpet call
